name: Need for Speed: Most Wanted Settings
summary: Learn about .NFS13SAVE files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: NFS13SAVE files that contain controller configurations are named controls.nfs13save. NFS13SAVE files that contain user settings are named config.nfs13save. You may also encounter an NFS13SAVE file named mud.29.nfs13save. This file contains both binary and text data.

instructions: You can open and edit text-based NFS13SAVE files in Microsoft Notepad or any other text editor. However, you if you need to edit your Need for Speed: Most Wanted settings, it is likely best to do so from within the game, and not by editing your NFS13SAVE files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
